en.title: Building a Blog Website with Remix
en.description: Recently, I have been learning about Remix and had the idea of creating my own blog website, so I built this blog site using Remix technology. The blog is based on a model that separates the website from its content, deploying the site on Vercel and using a GitHub repository as the database to store the blog content.

zh.title: 基于Remix打造一个博客网站
zh.description: 最近在学Remix，也有自己写一个博客网站的想法，于是我就利用Remix技术搭建了这个博客网站。博客基于网站和内容分离的模式，将网站部署在Vercel，并使用Github仓库作为数据库存储博客内容。
